TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RequestedSecurityToken extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks The token is usually opaque to the token requestor.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the requested security token.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the issued token.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor is usually used by the token issuer.
The following table shows the properties of the new instance.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityToken%2A>|The value of the `token` parameter.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityTokenXml%2A>|`null`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlElement tokenAsXml) cil managed

Docs.param: An that contains the XML representation of the requested security token.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the token XML.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor is usually used by the receiver.
The following table shows the properties of the new instance.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityToken%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityTokenXml%2A>|The value of the `tokenAsXml` parameter.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityToken As SecurityToken

Docs.summary: Gets the issued security token when the instance was created using the token itself.
Docs.value: A that represents the issued security token. if the instance was created using the token XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Gets the issued security token when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken> object was created by using the token itself (represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object). The value of the property is `null` if the instance was created using the token XML. In this case the token XML can be accessed from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityTokenXml%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityTokenXml As XmlElement
public: property System::Xml::XmlElement ^ SecurityTokenXml { System::Xml::XmlElement ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the XML representation of the issued security token when the instance was created using the token XML.
Docs.value: An that contains the XML representation of the security token. if the instance was created using a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Gets the issued security token when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken> token XML. The value of the property is `null` if the instance was created using the token itself (represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object). In this case the token can be accessed from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityToken%2A> property.
